name: Apple
info: An apple is an edible fruit produced by an apple tree. Apple trees are cultivated worldwide and are the most widely grown species in the genus Malus.

uses.use: Linked to a Lower Risk of Diabetes.

location: Central Asia,Jammu & Kashmir, Himachal Pradesh, hills of Uttar Pradesh and Uttaranchal.

name: Banana
info: A banana is an elongated, edible fruit botanically a berry produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa. In some countries, bananas used for cooking may be called 'plantains', distinguishing them from dessert bananas.
location: Today they are grown in tropical regions across the globe.

name: Peach
info: The peach is a deciduous tree first domesticated and cultivated in Zhejiang province of Eastern China. It bears edible juicy fruits with various characteristics, most called peaches and others, nectarines.
location: Jammu & Kashmir, Meghalaya, Uttarakhand, Sikkim, etc.

name: Orange
info: An orange is a fruit of various citrus species in the family Rutaceae; it primarily refers to Citrus sinensis, which is also called sweet orange, to distinguish it from the related Citrus aurantium, referred to as bitter orange.

uses.use: Makes it easier to absorb iron to fight anemia.
Boosts your immune system, your body's defense against germs.

location: Andhra Pradesh, Maharashtra, Karnataka, Punjab, Haryana and Rajasthan.

name: Guava
info: Guava is a common tropical fruit cultivated in many tropical and subtropical regions. The common guava Psidium guajava is a small tree in the myrtle family, native to Mexico, Central America, the Caribbean and northern South America.

uses.use: Help Relieve Painful Symptoms of Menstruation.

location: Punjab, Haryana,Allahabad and Lucknow in Uttar Pradesh.
